quotes.quote: He who despairs over an event is a coward, but he who holds hope for the human condition is a fool.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: I would rather be a coward than brave because people hurt you when you are brave.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: A coward turns away, but a brave man's choice is danger.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: None but a coward dares to boast that he has never known fear.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Foch

quotes.quote: Patience has its limits. Take it too far, and it's cowardice.
quotes.author: George Jackson

quotes.quote: A timid person is frightened before a danger, a coward during the time, and a courageous person afterward.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: There are several good protections against temptations, but the surest is cowardice.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A brave man dies but once, a coward many times.
quotes.author: Native American Proverb

quotes.quote: Many would be cowards if they had courage enough.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: The real hero is always a hero by mistake; he dreams of being an honest coward like everybody else.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: Cowardice asks: Is it safe? Expediency asks: Is it politic? But Conscience asks: Is it right?
quotes.author: William Punshon

quotes.quote: A thought which, quarter'd, hath but one part wisdom and ever three parts coward.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Conscience does make cowards of us all, and thus the native hue of resolution is sicklied o'er with the pale cast of thought.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote:
Cowards die many times before their deaths;
The valiant never taste of death but once.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote:
Cowards die many times before their deaths;
The valiant never taste of death but once.
Of all the wonders that I yet have heard,
It seems to me most strange that men should fear;
Seeing that death, a necessary end,
Will come when it will come.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Cowards die many times before their deaths; the valiant never taste of death but once.
